Constructor Detail

ContinousMeasurementPanel

public ContinousMeasurementPanel(YouScopeClientConnection client,
                                 YouScopeServer server,
                                 int imagingPeriod,
                                 java.lang.String configGroup,
                                 java.lang.String channel,
                                 double exposure,
                                 boolean increaseContrast)
Constructor.

Parameters:
client - Interface to the client.
server - Interface to the server.
imagingPeriod - The period between two images.
configGroup - The config group in which the channel is defined.
channel - The channel which should be imaged.
exposure - The exposure time for the imaging.
increaseContrast - True if the contrast of the image should be automatically increased.

Sets the exposure time for the continuous imaging.

setImagingPeriod

public void setImagingPeriod(int imagingPeriod)
Sets the period length between two successive images.

Parameters:
imagingPeriod - The period time.

stopMeasurement

public void stopMeasurement()
Stops the measurement. Does nothing if measurement is not running. The call immediately returns, even if the stopping of the measurement takes longer.

stopMeasurementAndWait

public void stopMeasurementAndWait()
Stops the measurement and waits until it is finished.

startMeasurement

public void startMeasurement()
Starts the continuous measurement.
